verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, an <S%G652>apostle<s%>, <S%G3756>(not<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>;)
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> which are <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, unto the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G1053>Galatia<s%>:

<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>,

<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>, <S%G3704>that<s%> he might <S%G1807>deliver<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> this <S%G1764>present<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G165>world<s%>, <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>:
To <S%G3739>whom<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.

I <S%G2296>marvel<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye <S%G3346>are<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5030>soon<s%> <S%G3346>removed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> him that <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%>:

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G243>another<s%>; but there <S%G1526>be<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1508>that<s%> <S%G5015>trouble<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3344>pervert<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G2532>though<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, preach any other <S%G2097>gospel<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G2097>preached<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, let him <S%G2077>be<s%> <S%G331>accursed<s%>.

<S%G5613>As<s%> we said <S%G4280>before<s%>, <S%G2532>so<s%> say <S%G3004>I<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, If <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G2097>preach<s%> any <S%G3844>other<s%> <S%G2097>gospel<s%> unto <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> ye have <S%G3880>received<s%>, let him <S%G2077>be<s%> <S%G331>accursed<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> do <S%G3982>I<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G3982>persuade<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>? <S%G2228>or<s%> do I <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>? <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G700>I<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G700>pleased<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, I <S%G302>should<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2252>be<s%> the <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G1107>certify<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3880>received<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G3777>neither<s%> was I <S%G1321>taught<s%> it, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> ye have <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> in time <S%G4218>past<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the Jews' <S%G2454>religion<s%>, how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2596>beyond<s%> <S%G5236>measure<s%> I <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4199>wasted<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4298>profited<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the Jews' <S%G2454>religion<s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> my <S%G4915>equals<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> mine <S%G3450>own<s%> <S%G1085>nation<s%>, <S%G5225>being<s%> more <S%G4056>exceedingly<s%> <S%G2207>zealous<s%> of the <S%G3862>traditions<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3967>fathers<s%>. equals: Gr. equals in years

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> it <S%G2106>pleased<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G873>separated<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G2836>womb<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> me <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>,

To <S%G601>reveal<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2097>preach<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>heathen<s%>; <S%G2112>immediately<s%> I <S%G4323>conferred<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> with <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>:

<S%G3761>Neither<s%> went I <S%G424>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> them which were <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> I <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G688>Arabia<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1154>Damascus<s%>.

<S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> I went <S%G424>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G2477>see<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1961>abode<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1178>fifteen<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>. went up: or, returned
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles<s%> saw <S%G1492>I<s%> <S%G3756>none<s%>, <S%G1508>save<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord's<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> I <S%G5574>lie<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.
<S%G1899>Afterwards<s%> I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2824>regions<s%> of <S%G4947>Syria<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2791>Cilicia<s%>;
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2252>was<s%> <S%G50>unknown<s%> by <S%G4383>face<s%> unto the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> they <S%G2258>had<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>, <S%G3754>That<s%> he which <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> in times <S%G4218>past<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2097>preacheth<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4218>once<s%> he <S%G4199>destroyed<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>.
